question: An app called “Google pay for business” was recently launched in which city?
explanation: A merchant focused Google Pay app called \'Google Pay for Business\' was launched in Chennai targeting small and medium size businesses. Apart from digital payments, the app allows merchants keep track of daily transactions sans paperwork. It was initially tried on a pilot basis in Bengaluru before the roll out. Google Pay has collaborated with Pine Labs and Innoviti to enable UPI payments across POS terminals, two lakh stores in over 3,500 cities and towns.
